action_click_tooltip: Taps the center of the selected element.
action_long_click_tooltip: Performs a long press on the center of the selected element.
action_swipe_down_tooltip: Swipes down within the element's bounds.
action_swipe_left_tooltip: Swipes left within the element's bounds.
action_swipe_right_tooltip: Swipes right within the element's bounds.
action_swipe_up_tooltip: Swipes up within the element's bounds.
about_subtitle: A GUI for managing and running Robot Framework tests on Android devices.
acknowledgements_text:
This application is built with Python and relies on several fantastic open-source projects:

•  **Python**: The core programming language.
•  **Tkinter**: Python's standard GUI library.
•  **ttkbootstrap**: For modern, themed widgets in Tkinter.
•  **Robot Framework**: The generic open-source automation framework.
•  **Appium**: For mobile test automation.
•  **Scrcpy**: For high-performance screen mirroring.
•  **pywin32**: For Windows-specific API calls.
adb_command_tooltip: Enter any ADB command without the 'adb' prefix.
command_added_to_list_message: The command '{command}' has been added to the common commands list.
command_already_exists_message: The command '{command}' already exists in the common commands list.
app_author_tooltip: Robot Runner - by Lucas de Eiroz Rodrigues
app_packages_tooltip: Comma-separated list of app package names for the performance monitor.
appium_already_running: INFO: Appium server is already running on port {port}.
appium_command_not_found: Appium command not found. Check if Appium is installed and the command in settings is correct.
appium_not_found_message: Could not verify Appium version. Please ensure it is installed and in your PATH.
appium_not_found_starting: Appium server not found. Starting automatically...
appium_running_message: An Appium server appears to be already running. Please stop it before starting a new one from this application.
appium_start_fail_error: Failed to start Appium server. Check the logs in the Settings tab.
appium_start_generic_error: ERROR: Failed to start Appium server: {e}
appium_started_successfully: INFO: Appium server started successfully on port {port}.
appium_starting_silent_error: ERROR: Could not start Appium server silently. The process failed.
appium_startup_timeout: ERROR: Appium server did not start within {timeout} seconds.
appium_stop_error: ERROR: Could not stop Appium server: {e}
appium_terminate_warning: WARNING: Could not terminate Appium process tree (PID: {pid}). It might have already ended. Error: {e}
appium_toggle_tooltip: Starts or stops the Appium server.
appium_version_error: Could not verify Appium version. Is it installed and in your PATH?
clear_tooltip: Clears the search and displays all elements.
connect_tooltip: Connects to a device using IP and Port.
copy_error_message: Failed to copy XPath to clipboard: {error}
copy_xpath_tooltip: Click to copy the XPath using {attr}: '{value}'
disconnect_tooltip: Disconnects a specific IP:Port, or all devices if fields are empty.
device_toolbox_tooltip: Opens a window with mirroring and other controls for the selected device(s).
devices_tooltip: Select device(s) to run tests on. Use Ctrl+Click or Shift+Click for multiple selections.
download_error_no_release: Could not find a compatible (win64) release of Scrcpy to download.
get_device_info_error: ERROR: Could not get device info for {udid}
get_ui_dump_error: ERROR: Failed to get UI dump.
group_by_tooltip: Select how to group the displayed logs.
input_error_connect: Please enter an IP Address and Port to connect.
input_error_pair: Please enter IP Address, Port, and Pairing Code to pair.
inspector_auto_refresh_tooltip: Automatically refreshes the inspector when UI changes are detected.
invalid_selection_message: Please select a valid test or suite file to run.
language_tooltip: Select the application language. Requires restart to apply.
log_write_error: ERROR: Could not write to log file. Error: {error}
logs_dir_tooltip: Path to the directory where test logs will be saved.
mdns_failure_tooltip: Auto-discovery failed. Attempting to open Developer Options... If it fails, navigate from the main Settings screen. Please enter the port manually.
mirroring_tooltip: Starts or stops the device screen mirroring.

no_active_recording_error: ERROR: No active recording process found to stop.
no_cache_for_period: No cache for the selected period.
no_log_files_found: No log files found to parse.
no_logs_found: No logs found for the selected criteria.
no_test_file_selected: No test or suite file selected.
no_command_to_add_message: There is no command in the entry field to add.
no_xpath_message: Could not generate XPath for the selected element with the chosen attribute.
pair_tooltip: Pairs with a device using IP, Port, and Pairing Code.
parsing_summary: Found {total_found} logs. Parsing {to_parse} for this period.
parsing_tooltip: Parsing logs... This may take a while depending on the number of logs.
period_tooltip: Select the time period for the logs to be displayed.
pull_ui_dump_error: ERROR: Failed to pull UI dump.
pywin32_required:
The 'pywin32' library is required to embed scrcpy on Windows.
Please install it by running: pip install pywin32
quit_message: Do you want to quit Robot Runner?
recording_start_error:
ERROR: Failed to start recording process.
{error}
recording_tooltip: Starts or stops the screen recording.
recordings_dir_tooltip: Path to the directory where screen recordings will be saved.
recording_unresponsive_warning: WARNING: Recording process unresponsive, terminating it.
refresh_devices_tooltip: Refreshes the list of connected devices.
refresh_tooltip: Refreshes the screenshot and the UI element list.
reparse_tooltip: Forces a re-parse of all logs for the selected period.
restart_adb_server_tooltip: Kills and restarts the ADB server, which can fix connection issues.
reparsing_logs_for_period: Reparsing all logs for period: {period}. This may take a moment...
repeat_test_tooltip: Repeats the last executed test on the same device.
restart_required_message: The theme change will be applied on the next application restart.
robot_process_already_finished: INFO: Robot process had already finished.
robot_options_tooltip: Additional options for the 'robot' command (e.g., --loglevel DEBUG).
robot_run_fatal_error:
FATAL ERROR: Failed to run robot test.
{error}
appium_command_tooltip: The command used to start the Appium server.
run_command_tooltip: Executes the specified ADB command and shows the output below.
add_to_common_commands_tooltip: Adds the current manual command to the common commands list.
run_test_tooltip: Runs the selected suite or test on the selected device.
save_settings_tooltip: Saves all current settings to settings.json.
screenshot_dimension_warning: WARNING: Could not get screenshot dimensions for resizing: {error}
screenshot_tooltip: Takes a screenshot and saves it to the 'screenshots' folder.
screenshots_dir_tooltip: Path to the directory where screenshots will be saved.
scrcpy_download_error: Failed to download or extract Scrcpy: {error}
scrcpy_download_success:
Scrcpy downloaded and extracted successfully to:
{path}
scrcpy_embed_error_invalid_handle: ERROR: Invalid Scrcpy handle before embedding.
scrcpy_embed_error_win32: ERROR: A win32 error occurred during embedding: {error}
scrcpy_find_window_error: ERROR: Could not find scrcpy window '{title}'.
scrcpy_not_found_message: Scrcpy was not found on your system. Would you like to download and install it automatically to the application folder?
scrcpy_path_tooltip: Path to the scrcpy executable file (scrcpy.exe).
scrcpy_start_error:
FATAL ERROR: Failed to start scrcpy process.
{error}
scrcpy_version_error: Could not verify scrcpy version. Is it installed and in your PATH?
search_inspector_element_tooltip: Searches for the element entered in the inspector search
search_tooltip: Searches for elements matching the XPath in the current UI dump.
select_app_package_warning: Please select an app package to monitor.

select_output_placeholder:
No output selected.

Please select an option from the control panel to view its output here.
settings_saved_message: Your settings have been saved successfully.
stop_recording_on_close: INFO: Stopping active recording before close...

wireless_ip_tooltip: IP address of the wireless device
